about_the_game:
No English Version - Only available in German language

GreenGuardiansVR - the game for the “KlimaZeit” ARD broadcast show on the topic “climate-effective lies” on Tagesschau24 on August 9, 2024.

Tricky and fun cooperative multiplayer action in VR

A mega-corporation beams you as a robot into a supposedly rosy future despite unchecked climate change. But rebels hack into the system to warn you: only together can you break through the propaganda machine, escape the corporation and save the world!

Short and sweet - 25 to 30 minutes

Experience the high-tech freight train of the mega-corporation E.V.I.L., overcome security, fight fossil drones and face the boss battle with the Juggernaut.

With the influencers LeFloid & ItzJanina

For the role of Vice President of E.V.I.L. The well-known german influencer and Youtuber LeFloid was won. Itzjanina, known from RocketBeans, hacks into the company network as the rebel Alena to help you.

Features

  • Cooperative VR multiplayer action adventure

  • Save the future with action, teamwork and humor!

  • Climate crisis meets science fiction meets satire

  • Travel into the future with your friends, resist the mega-corporation's propaganda and hack into the network with the help of the rebels

  • Grab a renewable energy pack and literally fight the causes of climate change

  • Fun action with brains! Catch the drones with your solar beam like a lasso!

  • Intelligent enemies - not only do they bombard you with oil, but they can also ram you and blow you away! 

  • With the well-known influencers LeFloid & ItzJanina

  • Fun-O-Calypse: Serious topic - fun look

  • 1 - 4 players

  • Playing time: 25 - 35 minutes

Climate crisis meets science fiction meets satire

The innovation project “GreenGuardiansVR” (GGVR) is a cooperation between the SWR X Lab and the Department of Economics and Environment. Following on from the topic “Climate lawsuits against ExxonMobil” from the KlimaZeit broadcast on August 9th, the game addresses the consequences of targeted disinformation from large corporations and how important it is to be able to distinguish fact from fiction.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 oder neuere Versionen
  • Processor: quad-core 3.0ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Meta headsets
